channel.title: Error Message 317 Client
channel.description:
[quote="bob2766, post:172, topic:449537"][s]TrisidiaX I need help the server works fine but the client won't work I specified my path and all that configured the client.java and compile.bat but I keep getting this error here is a paste of the error... :( (I'm still new to RS coding so I really need help)[/s]
Fixed it! :D
[code]TrisidiaX is loading.. java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\TrisidiaX_Cache_Webclient_V1.4\Maps\mapConfig. txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:115) at client.startUp(client.java:9183) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6185) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.io.FileNotFoundException: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/80555744/TrisidiaX_Cache _Webclient_V1.3.zip at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)
at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source)
at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Sou rce) at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getChainedException(Unkno wn Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown So urce) at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsURLConnectionImpl.getInputStream(Unkn own Source) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:109) at Update.<init>(Update.java:27) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4816) at client.startUp(client.java:9193) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6185) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/80555744/Tris idiaX_Cache_Webclient_V1.3.zip at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown So urce) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getHeaderField(Unknown So urce) at java.net.URLConnection.getHeaderFieldLong(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLengthLong(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLength(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsURLConnectionImpl.getContentLength(Un known Source) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:104) ... 6 more error[/code][/quote]
Ignore the quote above the error message. I have been getting this error message running TrisidiaX V2. This is a 317 server. Any help would be appreciated. Thanks!

item.title: Error Message 317 Client

item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

make sure your autocache downloader settings are right
and the cache settings as well=)

peace
